sen.j: 出前（でまえ）は、飲食店が自店で提供している料理などの飲食物を希望する顧客宅へ火急に配送するサービスである。
sen.e: Demae is a delivery service that restaurants and food shops deliver their dishes at customer's home quickly on their customer's demands.
Demae is a delivery service in which restaurants and food shops deliver dishes to customer's homes within a short space of time.
sen.cmt: Retranslated to correct grammar and read natually.
sen.e: Demae is a delivery service in which restaurants and food shops deliver dishes to customer's homes within a short space of time.

sen.j: 「仕出し」と呼ばれる場合もあり、あわせて説明する。
sen.e: It is also called 'Shidashi' and the difference between Demae and Shidashi is described below.
It is also called 'shidashi' and the difference between demae and shidashi is described below.
It is also called 'shidashi' and the difference between demae and shidashi is described below.

sen.j: 出前とは、店舗で調理した料理などを希望する顧客宅へ配送する業務で、その起源は江戸時代中頃にまでさかのぼる。
sen.e: Demae is a delivery service to deliver dishes which were cooked in restaurants and food shops to customer's home on their demands and the service is originated in Edo period.
Demae is a delivery service to deliver dishes which were cooked in restaurants and food shops to customer's home on their demands and the service is originated in Edo period.
Demae is a delivery service to deliver dishes which were cooked in restaurants and food shops to customer's home on their demands and its origin dates back to Edo period.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

sen.j: 店内に飲食スペースを設けない店や無店舗営業の業者による配送の場合はデリバリーと呼ばれることが多いが、厳密に区別ができるわけではない。
sen.e: It is often called just 'Delivery' in case of delivery by food shops without eating space or non store food servicers, but the difference between 'Demae' and 'Delivery' is not strict.
It is often called just 'Delivery' in case of delivery by food shops without eating space or non store food servicers, but the difference between 'Demae' and 'Delivery' is not strict.

In the case of food shops without eating space and for delivery service only, delivery service is often called 'Delivery' (in English) not 'Demae,' but 'Demae' and 'Delivery' are not strictly distinguished.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

sen.j: 同様に、祝い事や法事などに用いる和食の弁当や寿司などの配送は「仕出し」と呼ばれることが多いが、こちらも厳密に区別ができるわけではない。
sen.e: It is often called 'Shidashi' in case of delivery of Japanese boxed meal and Sushi for celebrations and Buddhist memorial services, but the difference between 'Demae' and 'Shidashi' is also not strict.

It is often called 'shidashi' when referring to the delivery of Japanese boxed meals and Sushi for celebrations and Buddhist memorial services, but the difference between 'demae' and 'shidashi' is also not strict.

It is often called 'shidashi' when referring to the delivery of Japanese boxed meals and Sushi for celebrations and Buddhist memorial services, but the difference between 'demae' and 'shidashi' is also not strict.

sen.j: 「出前」の場合は、火急に配達することを求める場合が多く、「仕出し」や「（ケーキなどの）配達」は事前に予約しておく場合が多いという違いもある。
sen.e: The difference is that the case of 'Demae' is often needed to deliver quickly and 'Shidashi' and 'delivery (of food like cake)' is often reserved in advance.
One difference is that 'demae' often needs to be delivered quickly, whereas 'shidashi' and 'haitatsu' (delivery) (of foods like cake) can be ordered in advance.
One difference is that 'demae' often needs to be delivered quickly, whereas 'shidashi' and 'haitatsu' (delivery) (of foods like cake) can be ordered in advance.

sen.j: 類似のサービスにケータリングがある。
sen.e: There is also catering in similar service.
Catering is a similar service.
Catering is a similar service.

sen.j: ケータリングは、注文主が用意する台所、あるいは移動調理車などを使って、現場で調理をするものである。
sen.e: Catering is a cooking service provided in any places of customer's demands like customer's kitchens or caterer's cooking wagons to travel.
Catering is a cooking service provided in any places of customer's demands like customer's kitchens or caterer's cooking wagons to travel.
Catering is a service providing foods cooked in remote sites on customer's demands, such as customer's kitchens or a catering car.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

sen.j: 「出前」「仕出し」は、完成した料理を配達するという点で決定的に異なるが、日本では明確に区別されているとは言いがたい。
sen.e: Demae' and 'Shidashi' are both delivery services to provide already cooked meals and completely different from 'Catering', but the difference is not defined very strictly in Japan.
Demae' and 'shidashi' are both delivery services that provide ready-cooked meals, and are completely different from 'catering,' but the difference is not strictly defined in Japan.
Demae' and 'shidashi' are both delivery services that provide ready-cooked meals, and are completely different from 'catering,' but the difference is not strictly defined in Japan.

sen.j: 予約が不要の「出前」を行っている飲食店には、寿司・蕎麦・うどん・丼物・ラーメン・中華料理・カレーライス・ピザ・洋食などがある。
sen.e: Restaurants and shops providing 'Demae' service without reservations often offer Sushi, Soba (buckwheat noodles), Udon (wheat noodles), Donburimono (a rice dish), Ramen (Japanese noodles originated in China), Curry and Rice, Pizza, Western dishes etc.

Restaurants and shops that provide a 'demae' service without the need for preordering offer foods such as sushi, soba (buckwheat noodles), udon (wheat noodles), donburimono (rice dishes), ramen (Japanese noodles which originated in China), curry and rice, pizza and Western dishes.

Restaurants and shops that provide a 'demae' service without the need for preordering offer foods such as sushi, soba (buckwheat noodles), udon (wheat noodles), donburimono (rice dishes), ramen (Japanese noodles which originated in China), Chinese dishes, curry and rice, pizza and Western dishes.

sen.j: 比較的安価なものが多い。
sen.e: Most of those dishes are relatively inexpensive.
Most of those dishes are relatively inexpensive.
Most of those dishes are relatively inexpensive.

sen.j: 予約をすることが一般的なものには、パーティ用の食べ物や葬祭・宴会などの料理などがあり、しばしば「仕出し」と呼ばれる。
sen.e: Party foods and funeral/banquet dishes are usually reserved and often called 'Shidashi'.
Party foods and funeral/banquet dishes are usually reserved and often called 'shidashi.'
Party foods and funeral/banquet dishes are usually reserved and often called 'shidashi.'

sen.j: これらは一般家庭で用意することが難しい、あるいは面倒なものであり、比較的高価なものが多い。
sen.e: Those dishes are hard to cook at home and relatively expansive.
Such dishes are difficult to prepare at home, troublesome or relatively expensive.
Such dishes are difficult to prepare at home, troublesome or relatively expensive.

sen.j: 企業の内部消費や接客用などにコーヒーやジュースなどの飲料を出前する場合もある。
sen.e: There is also 'Demae' service of drink provided for companies where their employees and customers drink the coffee and juice.
There are also 'demae' services for drinks provided for companies where employees and customers consume beverages such as coffee and juice.
There are also 'demae' services for drinks provided for companies where employees and customers consume beverages such as coffee and juice.

sen.j: また、出前される飲食物は、配送の都合で内容や量が店舗で出されるものとは異なることがある。
sen.e: Foods and drinks of 'Demae' service are sometimes different from those served at restaurants and shops in contents and quantities considering being delivered.
Foods and drinks of 'Demae' service are sometimes different from those served at restaurants and shops in contents and quantities considering being delivered.
For convenience of delivery, details (contents or quantity) of food offered on 'Demae' service are sometimes different from those served at restaurants and shops.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

tit.j: 出前・仕出しを行う業種

sen.j: そば屋
sen.e: Soba restaurant
Soba restaurants
Soba restaurants

sen.j: 中華料理店
sen.e: Chinese restaurant
Chinese restaurants
Chinese restaurants

sen.j: 寿司屋
sen.e: Sushi restaurant
Sushi restaurants
Sushi restaurants

sen.j: - ピザ宅配ピザも参照
sen.e: - refer also to Pizza, Takuhai (delivery) Pizza
- refer also to Pizza, Takuhai (delivery) Pizza
- refer also to Pizza, Takuhai (delivery) Pizza

sen.j: 大衆食堂
sen.e: Eating place
Bistros
Bistros

sen.j: 喫茶店
sen.e: Coffee shop
Coffee shops
Coffee shops

sen.j: 洋食店
sen.e: Western restaurant
Western restaurants
Western restaurants

sen.j: 和食店
sen.e: Japanese restaurant
Japanese restaurants
Japanese restaurants

sen.j: 業務用の出前
sen.e: Demae for business purposes
Demae for Businesses
Demae for Businesses

sen.j: 待合茶屋などのように原則として調理は行わず客をもてなすための料理はすべて仕出しで用意するといった業態もある。
sen.e: In a type of business like Machiaichaya (a Japanese traditional business offering meeting place), all the foods for their customers are not cooked in the place and ordered from Shidashi.
In a type of business like Machiaichaya (a Japanese traditional business offering meeting place), all the foods for their customers are not cooked in the place and ordered from Shidashi.

In some food businesses like Machiaichaya (a Japanese traditional business offering meeting place), all the foods are prepared using Shidashi service and served for the customers, instead of cooking by themselves.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

sen.j: この業態の現代版として、繁華街においては個人客の出前を受け付けず近隣で営業する店舗などにのみ出前を行うケースもある。
sen.e: It is seen a modern version of that type of business in downtown that provide Demae only to neighboring shops and not to individual customers.
It is seen a modern version of that type of business in downtown that provide Demae only to neighboring shops and not to individual customers.
As a modern form of that type of business in downtown, Demae service is sometimes limited to shops in neighborhood and individual order is not accepted.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

sen.j: 店舗側は厨房や要員を節約しつつ多様な料理を提供できるようになるというメリットがある。
sen.e: The merits of shops by using the service are that they don't need their own kitchen and staff to offer a diversity of foods to their customers.
The advantage of using this service is that establishments do not need their own kitchen facilities and staff in order to offer a diverse range of foods to their customers.
sen.cmt: Poor translation. Managed to salvage without a complete retranslation.
sen.e: The advantage of using this service is that establishments do not need their own kitchen facilities and staff in order to offer a diverse range of foods to their customers.

sen.j: 日本においては、注文はほぼ電話による会話だけで行われてきたが、一種の通信販売なので近年はファクシミリをはじめ、店のウェブサイトからインターネット経由で受け付けることが増えている。
sen.e: In Japan Demae had been ordered mostly on the phone, but recently more and more restaurants and shops take orders on their websites via internet like the other mail orders.
In Japan Demae had been ordered mostly on the phone, but recently more and more restaurants and shops take orders on their websites via internet like the other mail orders.
In Japan, Demae order has been accepted mostly on the phone, but recently more and more restaurants and shops take orders by fax or from their websites on internet as a sort of mail order.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

sen.j: 特に、2000年ごろからインターネットの出前ポータルサイトが普及してきており、中でも夢の街創造委員会が手掛ける「出前館」は、インターネットのない店舗でもインターネットからの受注ができる仕組みを開発し、インターネット出前受注の90%以上の市場占有率を開拓している。
sen.e: Especially from around 2000 Demae portal sites on the internet have become popular and especially 'Demaekan' run by Yumenomachi Souzou-iinkai developed the system that the shops without internet can take orders from the internet and has 90 % share of internet Demae orders.

Especially from around 2000 Demae portal sites on the internet have become popular and especially 'Demaekan' run by Yumenomachi Souzou-iinkai developed the system that the shops without internet can take orders from the internet and has 90 % share of internet Demae orders.

Especially Demae portal sites on the internet have become popular since around 2000 and especially 'Demaekan' run by Yumenomachi Souzou-iinkai developed the system that the shops without internet can take orders from the internet and accounts for 90 % share of internet Demae orders.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

sen.j: また2004年には飲食店情報を扱うポータルサイトの草分け的存在である株式会社ぐるなびが、「ぐるなびデリバリー」サービス事業を展開。
sen.e: Also in 2004 Gourmet Navigator Inc., a pioneering company of restaurant information portal site, started 'Gournavi Delivery' service.
Also in 2004, Gourmet Navigator Inc., a pioneering restaurant information portal site, started the 'Gournavi Delivery' service.
Also in 2004, Gourmet Navigator Inc., a pioneering restaurant information portal site, started the 'Gournavi Delivery' service.

sen.j: シェアを伸ばしている。
sen.e: The share is growing.
Its share of the market is growing.
Its share of the market is growing.

sen.j: 配送料金は無料、もしくはあらかじめ飲食物の代金に含まれている場合が多い。
sen.e: Delivery charge is mostly free or included in the price of foods and drinks in advance.
Delivery is usually free or already included in the price of the food and drink.
Delivery is usually free or already included in the price of the food and drink.

sen.j: このため少量（1人前など）の出前は採算に合わないこともあり、「出前は2人前以上」や「2,000円以上」、「1,000円以下の出前の場合には100円の出前料を頂きます」などとしている店もある。
sen.e: Therefore small Demae (like one portion) is not profitable and some restaurants and shops take orders only for 'more than 2 portions' or 'more than 2,000 yen' or charge 'additional 100 yen in delivery of less than 1,000 yen'.

Therefore the demae delivery of small quantities (such as a single portion) is not profitable, and some establishments only accept orders for "more than two portions," "more than 2000 yen," or state that "a delivery charge of 100 yen applies for orders of less than 1000 yen).

Therefore the demae delivery of small quantities (such as a single portion) is not profitable, and some establishments only accept orders for "more than two portions," "more than 2000 yen," or state that "a delivery charge of 100 yen applies for orders of less than 1000 yen).

sen.j: かつては自転車やオートバイで配達するとき、片手でハンドルを持ち片手に岡持ちを提げるアクロバティックな運転がみられた。
sen.e: Delivery men used to drive bicycle or motorcycle acrobatically to deliver foods holding a handle with one hand and an Okamochi (delivery box) with another hand.
Delivery men used to drive bicycle or motorcycle acrobatically to deliver foods holding a handle with one hand and an Okamochi (delivery box) with another hand.
Food used to be delivered by someone riding a bicycle or motorcycle in a somewhat acrobatic style, holding onto a handle with one hand and an Okamochi (delivery box) with the other.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて修正しました。

sen.j: ホンダ・カブの方向指示器スイッチが変則的な取り付け方をしてあったり、自動クラッチを採用しているのはこのような用途を念頭において開発されたためであった。
sen.e: Honda Cub was developed considering such delivery men's way of driving and the switch of turn-signal lights is installed on an unusual position and automatic clutch is adopted.

The installation of the indicator light switch in an irregular position and the adoption of an automatic clutch on the Honda Cub motorized bicycle were out of consideration for the needs of delivery drivers.

The installation of the indicator light switch in an irregular position and the adoption of an automatic clutch on the Honda Cub motorized bicycle were out of consideration for the needs of delivery drivers.

sen.j: その後は安全のために、出前用のオートバイに出前機（スプリングやエアクッションがついた専用の岡持ち台）を取り付けるか、荷台のある3輪スクーター（ホンダ・ジャイロ）を使うことが普通になっている。
sen.e: Later it became usual that motor bikes for Demae had Demae-ki (Okamochi-dai, a fixture with springs and air cushions to carry Okamochi) or three-wheel motor scooter with carrier (Honda Gyro) was used for delivery.

Later it became usual that motor bikes for Demae had Demae-ki (Okamochi-dai, a fixture with springs and air cushions to carry Okamochi) or three-wheel motor scooter with carrier (Honda Gyro) was used for delivery.

For safety reasons, however, it later became common for improved models of motorcycles, such as the Demae-ki (which was equipped with an Okamochi-dai, a fixture with springs and air cushions for the transportation of Okamochi), or a three-wheel motor scooter equipped with a carrier (e.g. Honda Gyro) to be used for delivering Okamochi.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて修正しました。

sen.j: 容器
sen.e: Container
Containers
Containers

sen.j: 飲食物の容器は配送した業者によって、追って数時間後から数日中に回収されることが多いが、近年は使い捨ての容器を用いて回収の手間を省くケースも増えている。
sen.e: Containers of foods and drinks are mostly picked up by restaurants or shops which deliver them in a few hours or days after the deliveries, but recently disposable containers are used more and more to save the efforts for collecting containers.

Containers for food and drink are usually collected by the delivery establishment within a few hours or days after delivery, but recently the use of disposable containers is becoming more common in order to save the effort of collection.

Containers for food and drink are usually collected by the delivery establishment within a few hours or days after delivery, but recently the use of disposable containers is becoming more common in order to save the effort of collection.

sen.j: そば屋の出前
sen.e: Soba-ya no Demae (Demae of Soba restaurant)
Soba Restaurant Demae
sen.cmt: Made more appropriate for a title
sen.e: Soba Restaurant Demae

sen.j: 注文と配達にはバックオーダーや調理場の混雑具合、道路の渋滞（特に夕刻の渋滞は夕食時間帯と重なり出前業界の大敵である）などの理由により、出前には遅延が付きものである。
sen.e: Demae can be always late because of back-order, busy kitchen and traffic jam (especially evening traffic jam which occurs in the dinner time, is an enemy to Demae business).
Demae can be always late because of back-order, busy kitchen and traffic jam (especially evening traffic jam which occurs in the dinner time, is an enemy to Demae business).

Delay in accepting order and delivery is inherent in Demae service because of back-order, busy kitchen and traffic jam (especially evening traffic jam which occurs in the dinner time, is a great risk to Demae business).
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

sen.j: これに対して苦情の電話を入れるとよく「今出ました」と言い訳されるといわれており、このことに例えて物事の遅延に対する安易な応対や言い訳を「そば屋の出前」と称されている。
sen.e: It is said that Soba restaurants often answer the complaint calls to late deliveries saying 'It went there just now', therefore easy excuses for delay are called 'Soba-ya no Demae'.

It is said that soba restaurants often answer phone calls complaining of late deliveries by saying that "It has just been sent," and therefore simplistic excuses for delays are called 'soba-ya no demae.'

It is said that soba restaurants often answer phone calls complaining of late deliveries by saying that "It has just been sent," and therefore simplistic excuses for delays are called 'soba-ya no demae.'

sen.j: 配送手段
sen.e: Means of delivery
Delivery Methods
Delivery Methods

sen.j: 自動車
sen.e: Automobile
Automobile
Automobile

sen.j: 原動機付自転車
sen.e: Motorcycle
Motorcycle
Motorcycle

sen.j: 自転車
sen.e: Bicycle
Bicycle
Bicycle

sen.j: 歩く
sen.e: On foot
On foot
On foot

sen.j: 大韓民国では日本のラーメンと同様に大衆化したチャジャンミョンの出前が古くからある。
sen.e: In Korea the Demae of Cha Jan Myon (Korean noodle dish) has been popular as Ramen in Japan since long ago.
In Korea the Demae of Cha Jan Myon (Korean noodle dish) has been popular as Ramen in Japan since long ago.
In Korea, Demae service is available traditionally in ordering Cha Jan Myon (Korean noodle dish that is popular among the people) like Ramen in Japan.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

sen.j: 日本と同様にバイクを使い、運搬には岡持ち（「鉄カバン」と呼ばれる）を使用する。
sen.e: As in Japan it is delivered by motorcycle and carrying Okamochi (called 'Tetsu Kaban (Iron Bag)').
As in Japan it is delivered by motorcycle and carrying Okamochi (called 'Tetsu Kaban (Iron Bag)').
As in Japan it is delivered by motorcycle and carrying Okamochi (called 'Tetsu Kaban (Iron Bag)').

sen.j: チャジャンミョン以外に、ちゃんぽん、うどん、チャーハン、酢豚なども扱っている。
sen.e: Besides Cha Jan Myon, Chanpon (noodle dish), Udon, Cha Han (fried rice) and Subuta (sweet-sour pork) are also delivered.
In addition to cha jan myon, chanpon (a noodle dish), udon, fried rice and subuta (sweet and sour pork) are also delivered.
sen.cmt: Rewritten for fluency and correct incorrect capitalisation.
sen.e: In addition to cha jan myon, chanpon (a noodle dish), udon, fried rice and subuta (sweet and sour pork) are also delivered.

sen.j: さらに近年ではピザやフライドチキンなどの宅配も登場し、またおでん日本国外のおでんやトッポッキを扱う屋台が携帯電話で注文を受け配達するケースもある。
sen.e: Also Pizza and fried chicken are delivered recently and also some food carts of Oden (Japanese stewed dish) and Toppokki (Korean stewed rice-cake) take orders of deliveries on cell phones.
sen.cmt: おでんの後の「日本国外のおでん」は訳出していません。
sen.e: Also Pizza and fried chicken are delivered recently and also some food carts of Oden (Japanese stewed dish) and Toppokki (Korean stewed rice-cake) take orders of deliveries on cell phones.

Recently, also Pizza and fried chicken are available on delivery and also some 'yatai' (food stall) offering Oden (Japanese stewed dish) and Toppokki (Korean stewed rice-cake) take orders of deliveries on cell phones.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

sen.j: 一方、中華人民共和国や東南アジア諸国では、これまでは、ごく近隣に徒歩で配達することはあるが、日本のようにバイクなどを使っての配達はまず行われなかった。
sen.e: On the other hand, in China and Southeast Asian countries, there were only deliveries on foot in the neighborhoods and no deliveries by motorbike as in Japan
On the other hand, in China and Southeast Asian countries, there were only deliveries on foot in the neighborhoods and no deliveries by motorbike as in Japan
On the other hand, in China and Southeast Asian countries, delivery service on foot is limited to the neighborhoods and delivery service by motorbike like Japan is not available.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて訳文を修正

sen.j: しかし2002年ごろから、香港、上海市などでバイクや自動車を使っての宅配が急速に普及してきた。
sen.e: However, from around 2002, delivery by motorbike and bicycle has spread rapidly in Hong Kong and Shanghai.
However, from around 2002, delivery by motorbike and bicycle has spread rapidly in Hong Kong and Shanghai.
However, from around 2002, delivery by motorbike and bicycle has spread rapidly in Hong Kong and Shanghai.
